fullText: Ms. Germann has created a work that is less a conventional drama than a fevered meditation on the possibility of human connection in a world where everyone seems to be speaking a different language.

bwwExcerpt: Eclecticism has always been essential to Mr. Guare's writing, which at its best juggles mismatched elements of culture, high and low, with daring and dizzying skill.
